special.note: Spawn Night Demon on hex b
Spawn Wind Demon on hex c
Frost Demon Spawns on hex d and Sun Demon Spawns on hex e
Earth Demon Spawns on hex b and Flame Demon Spawns on hex c
Night Demon Spawns on hex d and Wind Demon Spawns on hex e
Spawn Flame Demon at a. If door I is not destroyed: Prime Demon suffers (2xC)+L-2 damage.
Spawn Earth Demon at b. If door I is not destroyed: Prime Demon suffers (2xC)+L-2 damage.
Spawn Frost Demon at c. If door I is not destroyed: Prime Demon suffers (2xC)+L-2 damage.
Spawn Wind Demon at d. If door I is not destroyed: Prime Demon suffers (2xC)+L-2 damage.
Spawn Wind Demon at d. If door I is not destroyed: Prime Demon suffers (2xC)+L-2 damage. Door I is destroyed.
Oozes and Giant Vipers are active.
Flame Demons and Frost Demons are active.
Spawn Living Spirits. At a for 2-3 characters. At both a and b for 4 characters.
Spawn Living Spirits. At b for 2 characters. At both a and b for 3-4 characters.
Open Door 1. Add water if 3-4 characters.
Light and Dark Strong. Fire, Ice, Wind and Earth Inert.
Spawn Vermling Scouts at c and d.
Spawn Vermling Scouts at e and f.
